Build ID: I20070517-1700 - org.eclipse.php_feature-incubation-N20070715.zip

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create new php-file
2.Add following Code:
<?php
 
 abstract class test{
 	abstract public function foo();
 }
 
 class test extends test{
 	public function f
 }
?>
3. Try to complete the "public function f" to foo() ends up in a "Unhandled event loop exception"


More information:
I know the php code is invalid, but I think it would be better to get a error message or a code hint, instead of a eclipse error ;)

Used PDT-Version:
org.eclipse.php_feature-incubation-N20070715.zip
